webServer

Class MicroWebServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • webServer.MicroWebServer

  • public class MicroWebServer
extends java.lang.Object
    MicroWebServer is a tiny implementation that sets up a webserver that returns a constant HTTP Response of 200 SuccessCodes It is a basic implementation that uses the ServerSocket class
    Author:
    tabci_000
    See Also:
    various devices or onto off-screen images. The aim of this class is to:
    • Illustrate a simple server implementation on Java
    • How a server sockets listens on the server sides
    • Process the client's request and returns a simple HTML page
